column4: got a sound question. I have a sound blaster card, and while I get sound, I have to turn my speakers all the way up, is there a way to amplify it?
run alsa-mixer to adjust the volume settings
okay, anything else I should check while I'm at it?
I hope that should be it
you can also add a Volume Control setting to the preferences menu, just right-click on System, and the panel edit menu
okay, I turned up all the sliders, but to no effect. I know the sound card works, but I'm just curious if it's only a windows card.
I'm currently checking the alsa site to find out more about the issue.
when you ran alsamixer did you adjust the Wave slider? There are more sliders visible if you resize the window.
I'm not seeing a wave slider either in GUI or terminal.
if you resize the window of alsamixer in terminal, there is no wave slider visible?
That is correct, what is shown however is a Master, Bass, treble, PCM, etc.
lol I had figured as much.
wow, who'd a thunk? that certainly helped. aparently the sound had been rerouted to my digital output.
